alert.note: Alert for Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN WARREN COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 48 miles west of Dunkirk to 15 miles southwest of Erie to 13 miles north of Warren. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Youngsville, Spring Creek, Lottsville, Enterprise, Garland, Grand Valley, Sugar Grove and Bear Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
